attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Create telemetry model-driven configuration for Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 to stream routing information base (RIB) summary and route counters (IPv4/IPv6). Use gRPC with no TLS. Telemetry server is 192.0.2.111 port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group RIB-ROUTE-COUNTERS
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-ip-rib-ipv4-oper:rib/vrfs/vrf/afs/af/safs/saf/ip-rib-route-counts
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-ip-rib-ipv6-oper:rib/vrfs/vrf/afs/af/safs/saf/ip-rib-route-counts
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.111
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-RIB-ROUTE-COUNTERS
  sensor-group-id RIB-ROUTE-COUNTERS sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
